main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Anadarko, Oklahoma on April 1, 1952, which was concluded to likely be a balloon.
interesting points: The object appeared as a circle with a pink center and light blue outside, glowing like a star., It was observed moving slowly from the northeast to the northwest., The sighting was not reported by any witnesses at the time., The information was relayed through a United Press correspondent., The investigation was documented in Project Blue Book, an official U.S. Air Force program.
sighted object: a glowing circular object in the sky
